I voted Brexit. It was a huge mistake & now I want to remain. Will you forgive me? #FBPE #stopbrexit #remainernow #Brexit #brexitshambles

GB citizens could now be uniquely second-class in Western Europe (NI Brits will have access to Irish citizenship via the GFA agreement). Why throw out a useful local reciprocal arrangement in favour of geographically distant third parties who aren't offering the same?
